history.proof: intros T U V f g F G H H1 H2. unfold filterlim in *. intros x H3. sfirstorder depth: 3.

ctx: intros T U V f g F G H H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment T : Type U : Type V : Type f : T -> U g : U -> V F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop G : (U -> Prop) -> Prop H : (V -> Prop) -> Prop H1 : filter_le (filtermap f F) G H2 : filter_le (filtermap g G) H x : V -> Prop H3 : H x Unable to unify "filter_le (filtermap g G) H" with "filtermap (fun x : T => g (f x)) F x".

original: intros T U V f g F G H H1 H2. unfold filterlim in *. intros x H3. apply H2. apply H1. auto.
